name: Sad Pony Guerrilla Girl
description:
His eyes were empty, corrupted by the fear. When I looked, I saw the void reflected in them and all the monsters that ever chased us. 

"They are everywhere! Carrying fireballs in their fingers."

He said.

"Dont fear if they shoot us, we are bulletproof, remember?”

She said.

“They can’t shoot us, because we're ghosts. And like ghosts we roam this place of no one, abandoned by humans and Jesus Christ.”

He said.

“You know that we were cursed since the start, Jesus didn't want us.”

She said.

"I know! But paradise is still here, I can feel. We carry it in our hell.”

He said.

“That’s why I like you, and I like my gun. I will drive in my little car, away from here… You will see… I’m your girl, and I will protect you.”

She said.
